NK100(the)009:1: // dpal a pa ra g+hir ti'i ye shes 'khor lo
NK100(the)009:2: gtan la dbab pa'i man ngag 'di la spyi don
NK100(the)009:3: gnyis te / slob bu nges shes bskyed pa brgyud pa'i lo rgyus bstan pa dang /
NK100(the)009:4: nyams su blang pa gdams ngag gi rim pa'o //
NK100(the)009:6: glad kyi don bstan pa dang /
NK100(the)009:7: gzhung gi don bstan pa dang /
NK100(the)009:13: gzhung gi don la gsum ste /
NK100(the)009:15: nyams su blang ba'i bsgom pa dang /
NK100(the)009:19: gdam pa yon tan dang bcas pa'o //
NK100(the)009:24: rgyal thabs spyi blugs kyi dbang rgyal bu rgyal sar 'don pa lta bu dang /
NK100(the)009:25: rig pa rang gsal zhugs mar rlung gis ma bskyod pa lta bu dang /
NK100(the)009:26: ye shes spyi blugs kyi dbang nam mkha' la nyi ma shar ba lta bu'o //
NK100(the)009:28: rgyal bu rgyal sar 'don pa lta bu'i dpe dang //
NK100(the)009:29: nam mkha' la sems gzung ba'i don bstan pa dang /
NK100(the)009:30: sems zin pa'i rtags stan pa dang /
NK100(the)009:31: bya ba gtang ba'i skyes bu lta bur rtsol med du bzhag thabs dang /
NK100(the)009:32: rta rgod 'dul ba bzhin du rjes thob ma yengs par btsa' thabs dang /
NK100(the)009:33: nam mkha'i sprin bzhin rang 'byung rang bzhin bcos thabs dang /
NK100(the)009:35: rig pa rang gsal la bdun te /
NK100(the)009:36: mar me la sogs pa'i dpe bstan pa dang /
NK100(the)009:37: dus gsum bar mas sems bzung pas don dang /
NK100(the)009:39: thi bya tshang du 'jug pa bzhin the tshom med par gzhag thabs dang /
NK100(the)009:40: rgyal po'i btsun mo bzhin rjes lta lta bas zin par btsa' ba dang /
NK100(the)009:41: rkun ma tshor bas 'bros pa bzhin /
NK100(the)009:42: skyon rang sems su ngo shes pas bcos pa dang /
NK100(the)009:44: ye shes spyi blugs la bdun te /
NK100(the)009:45: nam mkha' lta bu'i dpe dang /
NK100(the)009:46: 'dzin med du sems bzung pa'i don dang /
NK100(the)009:48: khyung nam mkha' la lding pa bzhin 'byung 'jug med par gzhag thabs dang /
NK100(the)009:49: rin po che'i gter bzhin rjes shes thang bcad la btsal ba dang /
NK100(the)009:50: dug la sngags kyis btab pa bzhin lta ba ris med du shes pas bcos pa dang /
NK100(the)009:53: snod bzang po la bstan pa dang /
NK100(the)009:54: snod ngan la bstan na ltung pa'o //
NK100(the)009:55: ye shes 'khor la gtan la dbab pa'i 'byed 'grel /
NK100(the)009:56: dbus pa rta yis gzhung dang mi 'gal bar sbyar ba'o //
